mapper.select: SELECT serviceId FROM tblService WHERE strServiceName = #{strServiceName}

SELECT s.serviceId, s.strServiceName, s.strServiceDesc, s.deciPrice, r.* FROM tblService s LEFT JOIN tblServiceRequirement sr ON s.serviceId = sr.serviceIdFK LEFT JOIN tblRequirement r ON r.requirementId = sr.requirementIdFK WHERE s.intStatus = 1 AND r.intStatus = 1 AND sr.intStatus = 1 ORDER BY strServiceName ASC
SELECT serviceId FROM tblService ORDER BY serviceId DESC LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tblService(strServiceName, strServiceDesc, deciPrice, intStatus) VALUES (#{strServiceName}, #{strServiceDesc}, #{dblPrice}, 1)
INSERT INTO tblServiceRequirement(serviceIdFK, requirementIdFK, intStatus) VALUES (#{serviceId}, #{requirementId}, 1)
